verses.verse: And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4100>him<s%>, Why hast thou <S%H6213>served<s%> us <S%H1697>thus<s%>, that thou <S%H7121>calledst<s%> us <S%H1980>not<s%>, when thou wentest to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H4080>Midian<s%>? And they did <S%H7378>chide<s%> with him <S%H2394>sharply<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>them<s%>, What have I now done in comparison with <S%H5955>you<s%>? Is not the gleaning of the grapes of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> of <S%H44>Abiezer<s%>?

God <S%H430><s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%>: and what was I <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in comparison with <S%H7307>you<s%>? Then their anger was <S%H7503>abated<s%> toward <S%H1697>him<s%>, when he had said <S%H1696>that<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, <S%H7969>he<s%>, and the three <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that were with <S%H5889>him<s%>, faint, yet <S%H7291>pursuing<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%>, I pray <S%H3603>you<s%>, loaves of <S%H3899>bread<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7272>follow<s%> <S%H5889>me<s%>; for they are faint, and I am <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Are the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> now in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> unto thine <S%H6635>army<s%>?

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Therefore when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, then I will <S%H1758>tear<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and with <S%H1303>briers<s%>.

And he went <S%H5927>up<s%> thence to <S%H6439>Penuel<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto them in <S%H2063>like<s%> <S%H582>manner<s%>; and the men of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him as the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> had <S%H6030>answered<s%>.

And he <S%H559>spake<s%> also unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When I come <S%H7725>again<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>, I will break <S%H5422>down<s%> this <S%H4026>tower<s%>.

Now <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> were in <S%H7174>Karkor<s%>, and their <S%H4264>hosts<s%> with <S%H2568>them<s%>, about fifteen <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3498>men<s%>, all that were left of all the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%>; for there <S%H5307>fell<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H8025>drew<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of them that <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> and <S%H3011>Jogbehah<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%>; for the <S%H4264>host<s%> was <S%H983>secure<s%>.

And <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>; and he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3920>them<s%>; and he took the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, and <S%H2729>discomfited<s%> all the <S%H4264>host<s%>.
And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H4608>from<s%> the ascent of <S%H2775>Heres<s%>.

And he <S%H3920>caught<s%> a young <S%H5288>man<s%> of the <S%H5288>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3789>him<s%>: and he described for him the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H7657>thereof<s%>, seventy and seven <S%H376>men<s%>.

And he <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, concerning whom ye did <S%H2778>taunt<s%> <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, Are the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> now in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> unto thy <S%H582>men<s%> that are <S%H3287>weary<s%>?

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H1303>briers<s%>, and with them he <S%H3045>taught<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>.
And he brake <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, <S%H375>What<s%> manner of <S%H582>men<s%> were they whom ye <S%H2026>slew<s%> at <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>? And they <S%H559>answered<s%>, As <S%H3644>thou<s%> <S%H259>art<s%>, so were they; each one <S%H8389>resembled<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, They were my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%>: as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, <S%H3863>if<s%> ye had saved them <S%H2421>alive<s%>, I would not slay <S%H2026>you<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3500>Jether<s%> his <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, <S%H6965>Up<s%>, and <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H5288>them<s%>. But the youth <S%H8025>drew<s%> not his <S%H2719>sword<s%>; for he <S%H3372>feared<s%>, because he was yet a <S%H5288>youth<s%>.

Then <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6965>Rise<s%> <S%H6293>thou<s%>, and fall upon <S%H376>us<s%>; for as the man <S%H1369>is<s%>, so is his strength. And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7720>crescents<s%> that were on their <S%H1581>camels<s%>' <S%H6677>necks<s%>.

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, <S%H4910>Rule<s%> thou over <S%H1121>us<s%>, both thou, and thy son, and thy <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3467>also<s%>; for thou hast saved us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4910>them<s%>, I will not rule over <S%H1121>you<s%>, neither shall my son <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H3068>you<s%>: Jehovah shall rule over <S%H4910>you<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7592>them<s%>, I would make a <S%H7596>request<s%> of <S%H5414>you<s%>, that ye would give me every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5141>ear-rings<s%> of his <S%H7998>spoil<s%>. (For they had <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>ear-rings<s%>, because they were <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%>.)

And they <S%H559>answered<s%>, We will <S%H5414>willingly<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6566>them<s%>. And they spread a <S%H8071>garment<s%>, and did <S%H7993>cast<s%> therein every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5141>ear-rings<s%> of his <S%H7998>spoil<s%>.

And the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>ear-rings<s%> that he <S%H7592>requested<s%> was a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, besides the <S%H7720>crescents<s%>, and the <S%H5188>pendants<s%>, and the <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H899>raiment<s%> that was on the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, and besides the <S%H6060>chains<s%> that were about their <S%H1581>camels<s%>' <S%H6677>necks<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H3322>thereof<s%>, and put it in his <S%H5892>city<s%>, even in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%>: and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it <S%H4170>there<s%>; and it became a snare unto <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, and to his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

So <S%H4080>Midian<s%> was <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%>. And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>.
And <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> had threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of his <S%H3409>body<s%> <S%H3318>begotten<s%>; for he had <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>.
And his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> that was in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, she also <S%H3205>bare<s%> him a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and he <S%H7760>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> old <S%H7872>age<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%> of the <S%H33>Abiezrites<s%>.

And it came to <S%H1439>pass<s%>, as soon as Gideon was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> turned <S%H7725>again<s%>, and played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>, and <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H1170>Baal-berith<s%> their <S%H430>god<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, who had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>;

neither <S%H6213>showed<s%> they <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%>, who is <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, according to all the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> which he had <S%H6213>showed<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
